def prime(n):
        l = [29]
        j = 31
        while (j <= n):
                i = 2
                t = 1
                while (i*i <= j):
                        if (j % i == 0):
                                t = 0
                                break
                        else:
                                i = i + 1
                if (t == 1):
                        l = l + [j]
                j = j + 1
        print sum(l)
                
l = int(raw_input())
while (l > 0):
        j = int(raw_input())
        prime(j)
        l=l-1
